channel.title: Exeption in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
channel.description:
Hello, When I'm trying to run a client it gives me this error: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/code]
I've downloaded the newest JDK and JRE, set the classpath and path but it still doesn't work. This occures at the Exion client and the soul split client. I haven't tested others.
Run.bat code: [code]@echo off title Exion Client java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
Windows XP SP3 Intel Pentium III processor: 997 MHz, 384MB JDK version: 6u22 JRE version: 6.0.220.4
EDIT: Never mind. I had to change java -Xmx300m to java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar

item.title: Exeption in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

add “cd wherever\the\file\is\kept” like this:

@echo off title Exion Client cd wherever\the\file\is\kept java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
This tells the batch file where to look for and execute the Jframe class file.

Read full topic

item.title: Exeption in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
item.dc:creator: @P_R_0_Rusher P R 0 Rusher
item.description:
@P_R_0_Rusher wrote:

[quote=“thomas27, post:1, topic:368685”]Hello,
When I’m trying to run a client it gives me this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

I’ve downloaded the newest JDK and JRE, set the classpath and path but it still doesn’t work.
This occures at the Exion client and the soul split client. I haven’t tested others.

Run.bat code:

@echo off title Exion Client java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Windows XP SP3
Intel Pentium III processor:
997 MHz, 384MB
JDK version: 6u22
JRE version: 6.0.220.4

EDIT: Never mind. I had to change java -Xmx300m to java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar[/quote]

It says unknown source try other client maybe client cant run that source

Btw rong section “client help”
